title: Routine eye scan 'could predict 10-year heart attack and stroke risk', University of Dundee study suggests
description: Researchers used artificial intelligence (AI) to analyse digital retinal photographs, with the technology able to produce personalised risk predictors in less than a second.
content:
A scan which forms part of a routine eye test could help predict a person's risk of having a heart attack or stroke within the next 10 years, a study has suggested.

title: AI firms ‘unprepared’ for dangers of building human-level systems, report warns
description: Future of Life Institute says companies pursuing artificial general intelligence lack credible plans to ensure safety
content:
Artificial intelligence companies are “fundamentally unprepared” for the consequences of creating systems with human-level intellectual performance, according to a leading AI safety group.

title: The King and AI: A humanoid robot has painted a picture of Charles. How did it do?
description: The artistic humanoid used advanced artificial intelligence algorithms and a robot arm using on oil canvas to create the image.
content:
Whether or not the UK will have a Royal Family in the future is something that often comes up in debate.
If we do, the latest evidence suggests there will be no lack of artists around to paint them.

title: 100-year-old woman reacts to AI video of dead husband
description: An elderly woman in Argentina is remembering her late husband in a new way, after her grandson shared a video of him made with artificial intelligence.
content:

description: The CEO said the company plans to spend hundreds of billions on developing artificial intelligence products
content:

title: Westinghouse plans to build 10 large nuclear reactors in U.S., interim CEO tells Trump
description: The company made the announcement at an energy and artificial intelligence conference attended by President Donald Trump on Tuesday.
content:

description: Republican Gov. title: Tech and energy giants pour billions to turn Pennsylvania into an AI hub as part of Trump’s tech push
description: President Donald Trump on Tuesday announced an investment of more than $90 billion from private companies across tech, energy and finance to turn Pennsylvania into a hub for artificial intelligence — a technology that’s expected to upend everything from the economy to health care and education.
